data.comment: Add | //div[@class='library-box']/ul/* to the pageElement for the movie library page, but you will need to click on the page divider links
Added for completeness. Full example URL omitted intentionally

The set in autopagerize database didn't work for me even when I localized it to the US, so I used the ajax method. Incremental URL worked as well, but figured it wouldnt hurt to have multiple methods. It's a completly different experience not being confinded to the 46 -50 it loads by default. I'm working on a method using infyscroll to automate pulling the entire inventory and building a database on it the items and do my own custom sorting, filtering, and alerts. The discords, bots, and userscripts that already exist are good too, but again, Having another independent method to get to the same end is never a negative in my book.Hopefully I labeled everything in the right place. is there a way to automate importing saves to here i missed?

data.exampleUrl: https://yande.re/post https://yande.re/comment http://konachan.com/post http://konachan.com/comment https://www.sakugabooru.com/post https://www.sakugabooru.com/comment

data.clickElement: body > c-wiz > div > div > main > div > div > div > button

data.pageElement: //div[@id='posts'] | //div[starts-with(@id,'a-')]/*[@class='striped' or (contains(@class,'post') and not(contains(@class,'posts'))) or self::section and count(@*)=0]

data.clickElement: div.pagination > button[aria-label='pagination next'], div.pagination > button[aria-label='pagination'][disabled] + button
data.pageElement: div.container > div > main > section > section > div > *

data.comment: The style hides video moment items, which are supposed to be hidden; can alternatively target [data-visible='false'] elements
Added by request and for completeness
Updated by infy to use a safe example URL
Updated by infy to use a safe example URL
AJAX due to next-to-last pages in the pagination no longer being links

data.clickElement: div.container > div.overflow-hidden > div > div > div > button.btn.text-smd.mx-4:has(> svg)
data.pageElement: div.container > div.overflow-hidden > div > div.mt-7 > div:not(:has(> button))
div.container > div.overflow-hidden > div.flex.flex-col, div.container > div > div.grid

data.clickElement: div.pagination > a.button_next, div.pagination > span:has(a[aria-current='page']) + span > a

data.comment: Updated by infy to support lazily loaded images, the front page, and the mobile version of the site

data.pageElement:
//div[(contains(@class, 'text-gray-300')) and not(contains(@class,'dark:text-gray-300'))]/*
[
not(self::a[contains(@title,'Report Ad')])
and not(self::div//div[@x-show='!aiResults.authorized'])
and not(local-name()='svg')
and not(self::div//div[contains(@class,'bg-presearch-alternative')])
and not(self::div//div[@x-text='ad.description'])
]

data.comment: Currently only for q= or query= URLs or via address bar web searches. Add &cat=images or &cat=video or &cat=news in the URL to access other tabs besides web. Full compatibility without these requirements coming soon.
Anonymous Database Contribution fulfilled by infy. Originally created by brib2 (http://wedata.net/items/85922)
Updated to support all pages of the site

data.style: #bigbox > td > table > tbody > tr:has(a[rel='next']) { display: none !important; }
